subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: PX - Has anyone tried this piece of equipment?

Thx
I was wondering if Bill Chappell made that......
I can't say for certai=
n that I trust that the Ovilus really works.......
Most of the time it just=
 keeps saying the same thing over and over again.
I will have to go check t=
hat PX EVP out on his website.
All of these devices are really interesting =
though, aren't they???
My favorite so far is MY Steve's Box........
That th=
ing is amazing..... Love it.....
Thx to Steve Hultay for selling it to me..=
..
debfransen

________________________________
From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of ghosttrackerguy
Sent: Wedn=
esday, August 18, 2010 1:48 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EVP-IT=
C] Re: PX - Has anyone tried this piece of equipment?



I currently use th=
is unit called the PX. It was offered by a company called digital dowsing. =
It was offered on a limited run by the creator Bill Chappell early 2010.

I=
t is 1/2 ovilus 1/2 puck, which were 2 earlier devices created by Bill Chap=
pell. I have used this instrument on every investigation that I have been i=
nvolved with and it has provided some interesting results to say the least.=


The website with a full description on this device can be found here
www.=
digitaldowsing.com/px

Hope that this helps..

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om<mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>, "Fransen, Debbie" <debbie.fransen@...=
> wrote:
>
> It sounds like what the Ovilus does.... Who has come up with t=
his PX EMF?
> I have an Ovilus, and I am not really sure about it yet.
> St=
ill testing it...... How much are they asking for this PX EMF ?
> Some of t=
his equipment gets really expensive......
> debfransen
>
> ________________=
________________
> From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogrou=
ps.com> [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>] =
On Behalf Of Country
> Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 2010 12:16 PM
> To: EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] =
PX - Has anyone tried this piece of equipment?
>
>
>
> Hello Everyone:
>
> =
I am wondering if anyone has tried the PX EMF meter for EVP? Below is a des=
cription of this meter, in case you haven't heard of it. Any thoughts on th=
is meter?
>
> Thanks,
> Country
>
> """The PX EMF meter is a talking ghost =
box which translate EMF signals into speech. It uses an internal database o=
f 2000+ words or can translate in Phonetic Mode speech which is not in the =
dictionary. It also has a reverse Phonetic mode. My favorite though is the =
Touch Mode. In this mode, if the PX is left alone and someone or something =
touches it, it will start pinging like a deep sea submarine.
>
> 1: Diction=
ary Mode the PX has 2048 internal words that are used in this mode
> 2: Pho=
netic Mode the PX will use phonemes to speak
> 3. Reverse Phonetic Mode The=
 PX will reverse the phonetic output in effect it talks backwards
> 4. Touc=
h Mode this mode is used to detect if the device is being touched
> 5. Voic=
e Change Mode, this mode is the same as #1 dictionary mode except the voice=

> can be altered detected inputs
> 6. Repeat Mode say last words said .. i=
n this mode the PX will repeat the last words spoke from last said to first=

> up to 400 words.
> 7. Energy Mode : this mode allows the user to set the=
 sensitivity of the device with one of 3
> preset levels. The PX will say L=
OW then give four beeps pressing mode during this time will set the Energy =
level low."""
>




--_000_AB3E6B5188566C488E011B9C54CF2A18060575F358satlrccdlmb60_
